html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

This Marvel Strike Force codes list contains codes to redeem and earn free rewards!

The Marvel comic universe is well-loved by many. Hence, the popularity of Marvel Strike Force, a mobile RPG where you use iconic heroes and villains to combat adversaries.

Winning is easier with the right but limited characters and weapons. Since they are limited, you can use redeemable codes to claim rewards like spins, coins, and gems and get strong characters and weapons.

Working codes for the game can be found below:

  • WINTERGIFT
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • ENVOYHOLIDAZE
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • DREAM
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • SYMBIOTESMASH
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • KINGINBLACK
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • ORCHIS
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • ASSEMBLE
    • Redeem for Rewards
  • 5CCHALLENGE
    • 3M Gold and 100 Power Cores
  • TOURNAMENTDAY
    • 600 L3 Training Modules and 100 Power Cores
  • SHURI
    • 10 Queen’s Entourage Orbs and 5 Pym Pals Orbs
  • POOLPARTY1
    • 10 Gold Orbs, 200 L4 Training Modules, 100 L3 Training Modules and 100 T4 Ability Mats
  • THECHAMPIONCC
    • 4.5M Gold
  • WHOWILLWIN
    • 300 Power Cores
  • ONEMORETIME
    • 750 L3 Training
  • CCENVOY
    • Rewards
  • CELEBRATE
    • 2M Gold, x100 T4 Ability Material, and L4 Training Module
  • GAMBIT
    • Gambit character, x500 Power Cores, and x10k Premium Orb Fragments
  • VENOMFREE
    • Venom character, x500 Power Cores, and x10k Premium Orb Fragments
  • WELCOME
    • x20k Legacy Orb Fragments, x20k Legacy II Orb Fragments, and x20k Legacy III Orb Fragments
  • Night
    • Nightcrawler mode (level 60 and above)
  • Pool
    • Deadpool, 500 power cores, and 10k premium orb fragments

Steps to Redeem Marvel Strike Force Codes

Follow the steps below on how to redeem the codes

  • Launch the game.
  • Press Setting
  • Press Redeem
  • Paste the redeemable codes
  • Claim your rewards from the mailbox

My Redeem Codes Are Not Working

Marvel Strike Force codes comprise numbers and letters of different cases. As a result, the most common reason the codes will not work is due to the wrong spelling. Ensure you pay attention to the letter cases to prevent this error.

Previously redeemed or expired codes will not work, so pay attention to them.

Final Thoughts

Use the codes in this list to claim amazing rewards such as free spins, coins, and gems. If you have any questions related to codes or the game, kindly use the comment section.

Playoholic also has the latest/working codes for Roblox like Crewmates and Nightmare Elemental, and non-Roblox games like Captain Tsubasa, and Dynasty Warrior M. Happy gaming with your powerful hero!

Paul has been a writer for over 5 years, and has played mobile games for over 10 years. He runs a TikTok account providing Call Of Duty Mobile content, and this is also his favorite game. He has ghost written for popular gaming site Blue Stacks and now brings his knowledge of mobile gaming to Playoholic.
